net.ligreto.executor.layouts
Class JoinLayout

java.lang.Object
  net.ligreto.executor.layouts.JoinLayout
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregatedLayout, DetailedJoinLayout, InterlacedJoinLayout, NormalJoinLayout
public abstract class JoinLayout
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the interface for implementing various join layouts that could be used to build various reports using the specified report builder class.

Author:
Julius Stroffek

Nested Class Summary
static class JoinLayout.JoinResultType
          Indicates the type of the result to be processed.

                         throws java.sql.SQLException,

dumpRow

public abstract void dumpRow(int[] highlightArray,
                             JoinLayout.JoinResultType resultType)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             LigretoException,
                             java.io.IOException
Will dump the result row from the corresponding result sets. The method will also call the ResultSet.next() method on the result sets where the row was processed. The method will highlight some of the columns based on the array specified

Parameters:
highlightArray - Determines which columns should be highlighted.
resultType - Determines whether to dump the row from the first, second or both result sets.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
LigretoException
java.io.IOException

             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                    LigretoException,
                    java.io.IOException
Will dump the result row from the corresponding result sets. The method will also call the ResultSet.next() method on the result sets where the row was processed.

Parameters:
